Articles.Content:
I am looking for a lander module. I have looked all through the forums, and I have utilized the search feature(before someone gets smart)

I have also tried google to no avail, I am looking for the 1m(I guess) lunar lander mods, If someone can link me to a few of those, I would be greatly appreciative!

Thanks!

Yeah I think the forums need a better search engine. Better yet, we need a dedicated Mod download link section on top of the current "Addon Release and project showcase". It's pretty hard to find the exact mod you want, you always have to read the thread continuously for new cool mods. Wish there were just a plain list, with categories, of dl links for mods. Yes there's an official mod page, but it's never up to date and has just a handful of the stuff out there. There are generally will have plenty of landers though, check the rocket and parts packs on the addon releases, they generally will have them. For sure, check Nova Silisko's page. That dude is a BOSS.
Maybe the mem lander from luigio97 (the mem mod pack, you have a working camera and your countryflag with song when you activate it, really cool)
